scripts.install: npm install --prefix auth_service && npm install --prefix notification_service && npm install --prefix api_gateway
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd auth_service && npm run dev" "cd notification_service && npm run dev" "cd api_gateway && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd auth_service && npm start" "cd notification_service && npm start" "cd api_gateway && npm start"
